Item.name: CS:GO Negev
Item.description: This addon adds the Negev from Counterstrike : Global Offense to Garry's Mod.
Item.pro: It has a big magazine, so you have a lot of bullets.
It looks dangerous.
Item.con: It is a heavy weapon, so it has much recoil.
Does not deal many damage with one shot.
Item.hint: Pretty hard to handle.

Item.name: Holy Handgrenade
Item.description: This addon adds a custom grenade to the traitor shop. The item explodes after it had been thrown and deals much damage.
Item.pro: Every player catched by the explosion dies.
The sound played before the detonation is hillarious.
Item.con: After throwing the grenade takes a few seconds to detonate.
Item.hint: For Traitors: Use this item to kill a group of players.
For Innocents: Run if you hear a "Hallelujah".

Item.name: Cloaking Device
Item.description: This addon adds a custom item to the traitor shop. The item allow the player to get nearly invisible.
Item.pro: The traitor cannot be seen too easily.
Item.con: Players can see a silhouette of the player.
Weapons (exept the custom item) do not become invisible.
Left-click plays a screaming sound.
Item.hint: Combine this item with the Deathfaker.
Right-click activates the item.

Item.name: Deathfaker
Item.description: This addon adds a custom item to the traitor shop. The item drops a fake body to the ground.
Item.pro: You can fake your death.
Item.con: The fake body has the traitor roll.
Item.hint: TODO: Displayed as dead in scoreboard?

Item.name: Defibrilator for Detectives and Traitors
Item.description: This addon adds a custom item to the traitor / detective shop. The item allows the user to revive another player.
Item.pro: You can ressurect a player of your team.
Item.con: The process takes a short time.
Item.hint: Drag the dead body to a safe place.

Item.name: Zombie Perk Bottles
Item.description: This addon adds a bunch of custom items to the traitor shop. The Juggernog is buyable by detectives and traitors. When purchased, the player will immediately consume it. While drinking, you can't switch to another item slot. It is a single-use-item and will give the player 100 HP. The PHD Flopper reduces fall and explosion damage to zero. When the player lands from a semi-high fall, he will cause a little explosion that can kill other players. Stamin-Up will make you walk a lot faster than normal.
Item.pro: Stamin-Up is really good for getting away.
Item.con: The consume of a bottle takes a while.
While consuming a bottle, a loud burping sound is played.
Item.hint: PHD Flopper and Stamin-Up take the same slot. You can use only one of them.
The image for Stamin-Up and Juggernog are pretty similar to each other.

Item.name: Baby Launcher
Item.description: This addon adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. It will launch a baby.
Item.pro: The item will kill on hit.
Item.con: Single use item.
A sound of a baby is played when the traitor uses this item.
Item.hint: Good for killing a single person.
You could get a collateral.

Item.name: Flare Gun
Item.description: This addon adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. It can burn people and props.
Item.pro: The item deals damage over time.
The item can burn dead bodies.
Item.con: It fires slow.
The weapon has a long reload time.
Item.hint: Cover up your kill.

Item.name: Dead Ringer
Item.description: This addon adds a custom item to the traitor and detective shop. It will disguise the player when they get damage.
Item.pro: You are fully disguised including your weapon and your name.
Item.con: You have to activate it manually.
You will get visible after a certain amount of time.
The activision triggers a beep sound.
It has to recover before you can use it a second time.
Item.hint: The item is activated by holding it in the hand and right-clicking.
Other players can see this item in your hands when you select it.

Item.name: Melon Launcher
Item.description: This addon adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. It will launch an explosive melon.
Item.pro: The item deal much damage.
The item can kill multiple persons at one time.
Item.con: Sometimes it does not kill, even if the shot hits the target.
Contains only one shot.
Item.hint: The item remains in the item slot after using it.

Item.name: Orbital Friendship Beam
Item.description: This addon adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. The traitor can use it to call a deadly beam from orbit.
Item.pro: Will kill everyone inside the radius immediately.
Item.con: The shot has to be on point. It does not kill someone outside the damage radius.
It plays "My little pony" at the traitor's location.
Item.hint: It is also usable by innocents.

Item.name: Second Chance
Item.description: This addons adds a custom item to the traitor shop. It give the traitor the chance to be revived after their death.
Item.pro: The change of a second life increases when a player got killed after activation.
Item.con: This item operates randomly.
Item.hint: Starts at a chance of 40%.

Item.name: Advanced Disguiser
Item.description: This addon adds a custom item to the traitor shop. It give the traitor the possibility to change his id to the id of someone else.
Item.pro: This item can be used multiple times.
This item can be used on dead bodies.
Item.con: Actually nothing.
Item.hint: Very useful in rounds with many players.

Item.name: Banana Bomb
Item.description: This addon adds a custom grenade to the traitor shop. The item splits into multiple parts after being thrown.
Item.pro: The item deals a lot of damage.
Item.con: It takes much time for the detonation.
Item.hint: Should only be used for fun.

Item.name: Poison Dart Gun
Item.description: This addons adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. If the player lands a hit on another player, the victim will be damaged every second until death.
Item.pro: The weapon is silenced, so the shot cannot be heard.
The traitor can cause a lot of pressure on the innocents.
Item.con: It takes a long time to reload the gun.
Item.hint: Try to poison all innocents. Then you can lay back and watch them die.

Item.name: Traitor Bio Weapon
Item.description: TODO
Item.pro: TODO
Item.con: TODO
Item.hint: TODO

Item.name: Tripwire Mine
Item.description: This addon adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. It is a mine that can be placed on every solid surface. Whenever an innocent or an object crosses the beam of light, the mine explodes.
Item.pro: Normally, this mine does not kill the traitor.
Item.con: The traitor can activate the mine, when he crosses the beam with an object or his weapon.

Item.name: Boomerang
Item.description: This addons adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. The boomerang can silently kill people, even from a greater distance. It can be used multiple times.
Item.pro: This items is nearly quiet.
Item.con: It is pretty hard to identify the item in your hands.
Item.hint: It is not suitable for a group of players, although you can kill multiple people with a single strike.

Item.name: Mirror Fate
Item.description: This addons adds a custom item to the traitor shop. The item kills the user's killer after 30 seconds.
Item.pro: You can help your team, even if you are dead.
Item.con: It is useless when you are alone.

Item.name: Thriller Dart Gun
Item.description: This addon adds a custom weapon to the traitor shop. It will stun the player when the shot hits the target. After playing a part of Thriller from Michael Jackson, the target dies.
Item.pro: You have multiple shots.
Item.con: The target does not die instantly.
Item.hint: The player can talk until he or she is dead. Attack the target from behind.
TODO Semiautomatic?

Map.name: Pac Man V1
Map.feature: Red button at the start makes the ghosts vulnerable.

Addon.name: MapVote - Fretta-like Map Voting
Addon.description: This addon adds a custom map vote system to the server. It is easy to handle and allows players to call a mapvote.

Addon.name: TTT Killer Notifier
Addon.description: This addon announces your killer and his or her role.

Addon.name: Drowning Indicator
Addon.description: This addon adds a custom gui to the server. It displays the amount of time the player can stay under water.

Addon.name: Player Info
Addon.description: This addon announces the number of players grouped by roles on every round start.

Addon.name: ULX Admin Tools
Addon.description: This addon adds various features to the server such a custom gui. Joining players do not have to download it.
